entity.name: composition_of_schematic_element_occurrence
entity.description: A composition_of_schematic_element_occurrence is a representation_relationship that is a Composition_of_schematic_element_occurrence.

explicit.name: SELF\representation_relationship.rep_1
explicit.description: a schematic_element_occurrence that contains the part.

explicit.name: SELF\representation_relationship.rep_2
explicit.description: a schematic_element_occurrence that is a part of the whole.

entity.name: connection_of_schematic_element_occurrence
entity.description: A connection_of_schematic_element_occurrence is a representation_relationship that is a Connection_of_schematic_element_occurrence.

explicit.name: SELF\representation_relationship.rep_1
explicit.description: a schematic_element_occurrence that is connected to side_1.

explicit.name: SELF\representation_relationship.rep_2
explicit.description: a schematic_element_occurrence that is connected to side_2.

entity.name: definition_of_schematic_element_occurrence
entity.description: A definition_of_schematic_element_occurrence is a subset relationship that is a Definition_of_schematic_element_occurrence.

explicit.name: SELF\subset.subset
explicit.description: a schematic_element_occurrence that is defined by the superset.

explicit.name: SELF\subset.superset
explicit.description: a schematic_element that defines the subset.

entity.name: derivation_of_schematic_element_definition
entity.description: A derivation_of_schematic_element_definition is a presentation_representation_relationship that is a Derivation_of_schematic_element_definition.

explicit.name: SELF\presentation_representation_relationship.rep_1
explicit.description: a schematic_element_definition that is input to the geometric transformation to give the derived.

explicit.name: SELF\presentation_representation_relationship.rep_2
explicit.description: a implicit_schematic_element_definition that is obtained from the base by the geometric transformation.

entity.name: explicit_schematic_element_definition
entity.description: An explicit_schematic_element_definition is a schematic_subfigure_representation and a schematic_element_definition that is a Explicit_schematic_element_definition.

entity.name: implicit_schematic_element_definition
entity.description: An implicit_schematic_element_definition is a schematic_subfigure_representation that is a Implicit_schematic_element_definition.

entity.name: schematic_element
entity.description: A schematic_element is a presentation_representation and a class that is a Schematic_element.

entity.name: schematic_element_definition
entity.description: A schematic_element_definition is a schematic_element that is a Schematic_element_definition.

entity.name: schematic_element_occurrence
entity.description: A schematic_element_occurrence is a schematic_element that is a Schematic_element_occurrence.

entity.name: usage_of_schematic_element_occurrence
entity.description: A usage_of_schematic_element_occurrence is a presentation_representation_relationship that is a Usage_of_schematic_element_occurrence.

explicit.name: SELF\presentation_representation_relationship.rep_1
explicit.description: a schematic_element_definition that contains the part.

explicit.name: SELF\presentation_representation_relationship.rep_2
explicit.description: a schematic_element_occurrence that has a particular position and orientation within the whole.
